title: Have LCS games been getting less and less interesting?
body: Hardly any kills/skirmishes. Every one is afraid of going in. :( Or is it just the meta...

replies.body: TSM CLG C9 DIG WF are the proactive teams so any game not involving them is boring and if they screw up early you have to wait for them to regain their footing before it becomes interesting again

HAHA. Tell that Proactive news to TSM  in their game vs TL... They played a reactive team comp versus a heavy, EXTREMELY heavy engage from TL. 

Though, I will admit Cassio is the queen of Counter-Engage. O.O 2-3 seconds of have the enemy team staring at their screen while a hyper carry picks them apart.
hey they tried a new style and they didnt do it as well they are a proactive team

Yes, but a team cannot be proactive only (or you run the possibility of being shut down by super-reactive) or reactive only. For a team to do well internationally diversity with confidence is needed. Always on Constant Aggression dies out to Turtles (not wild ones). Late-game dedication gets nuked by early-mid comps.

While I agree that TSM is more comfortable on proactive engage heavy teams, they still lack the diversity to react to changes in enemy strategy mid pick/ban which has always been a weakness for them.

well, i do think EU is more interesting to watch than NA more action seems to happen.

now to stem that argument for a second, i do think both regions are pretty equal, i am not starting an eu vs na debate the above is just my opinion on watching games.

LCK is quite intersting to watch most times and LPL is exciting atm.

I watched Saturday's NALCS with a friend. The first 4 games were just dreadfully boring. 
Sunday's games were much better, although I only watched the endings.
At least some of the games end in under 30 minutes.  Last year they got painfully long
They're pros trying to win. It's boring but it's better than feeding and resulting in short games.

I watched Winterfox vs Team Liquid today. Liquid had the advantage for a solid 10 minutes, and they didn't *do* anything. Everyone just WAITED for someone to do something. Winterfox caught up in outer turrets, got them in a good position, and ended the game, and TL just did nothing about it. Was incredibly boring.
Better than Korea's games that are 3 to 1 kills at 60 minutes.
